titles.title: UNPLUGGED Schools Grant Act of 2025
UNPLUGGED Schools Grant Act of 2025
Utilize No Phones in Learning to Unleash Growth in Grades and Educate Distraction-free Schools Grant Act of 2025
To amend title IV of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to establish the UNPLUGGED Schools Grant Program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Workforce.
